类 ZTerm

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
ZTerm
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public final class ZTerm
extends javafx.stage.Stage
版本:
2020.08.25 ZTerm allows you to create a GUI application using System.out.println-like statements. Version History:

2020.02.29: Original version

2020.03.06: Added \n support for print and println. Added clear.

2020.03.10: Added textField, textArea, setTextInField, getTextInField, addButton support, repaint in clear.

2020.03.15: Does not exit on close; added close, addPasswordField, addList, addElementToList, removeElementFromList, getSelectedElementFromList

2020.03.21: Fixed non-removal in removeElementFromList, addList and addTextArea now has auto-scrollbars

2020.06.01: Lists of String type 2020.07.06: getElementFromList returns value of consistent type. Added getSelectedElementIndexFromList, setFilePath

2020.08.25: Lists replaced with tables (\t formats data in to columns. Supports optional header row.). Added addTable,

addRowToTable, clearRowsOfTable, getSelectedRowIndexFromTable, getSelectedRowFromTable. Exceptions thrown from invoked supplied methods are more readable. Added addImageIcon(BufferedImage), showErrorDialog(String), showWarningDialog(String). Title of showMessageDialog(String) says "information" instead of "message" (to match icon). addPasswordField, addTextArea and addTextField now return the text field index.

作者:
Zayan Zijesinghe

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ZTerm

      public ZTerm​(double width, double height)
      ZTerm constructor taking a width and a height suggestion for the window
      参数:
      width - Suggested width of content area as an double
      height - Suggested height of content area as an double

  • 方法详细资料

    • showHelp

      public void showHelp()
      Prints the version, credits and help file location.

    • getPasswordFromDialog

      public java.lang.String getPasswordFromDialog​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a password entry dialog box and returns the password. Note: Password stored as a String with convenience, not security, in mind. Has no connection with addPasswordField method.
      参数:
      message - The message that will be shown to the user.
      返回:
      Returns the entered password or null if cancelled.

    • addRowToTable

      public int addRowToTable​(int indexOfTable, java.lang.String rowData)
      Adds a row to an existing table. Use addTable method to add a table first.
      参数:
      indexOfTable - Index of an existing table (see addTable)
      rowData - Data for this row, optionally separated by '\t'. Automatically adds columns as needed.
      返回:
      Returns the index of the row (e.g. can be used with getSelectedRowFromTable method, etc.)

    • getColorFromDialog

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColorFromDialog​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a colour chooser. Refer to documentation of javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker's showDialog method for details.
      参数:
      message - The message that will be shown to the user.
      返回:
      Returns the chosen colour or null if cancelled.

    • addTable

      public int addTable​(int width, int height, java.lang.String columnNames)
      Adds a list-like table. Also see addRowToTable, getSelectedRowFromTable, getSelectedRowIndexFromTable and clearRowsOfTable methods.
      参数:
      width - Width in pixels
      height - Height in pixels
      columnNames - Tab-separated column names for header row. Use null for no header row.
      返回:
      Returns the index of the table (use this when adding to, retrieving from, etc. this table.

    • addButton

      public void addButton​(java.lang.String buttonText, java.lang.Object handlingObject, java.lang.String handlingMethodName, java.lang.Object... arguments)
      Adds a button.
      参数:
      buttonText - Button text.
      handlingObject - The object containing the method mentioned in handlingMethodName.
      handlingMethodName - The method that will be called when the button is pressed.
      arguments - The arguments of the called method. If non-args method, please do not enter the arguments.

    • setTabSize

      public void setTabSize​(int tabSize)
      Number of spaces used to replace a tab character by methods such as print and println. Does not affect tables. Does not affect previously added text.
      参数:
      tabSize - An int between 0-255 indicating the blue value.

    • addTextField

      public int addTextField​(java.lang.String defaultText, double widthInPixels)
      Adds a single-line text field. (See also addTextArea and addPasswordField). Access its contents using getTextFromEntry method. Modify its contents using setTextInEntry method.
      参数:
      defaultText - Default text. Give an emptry String to keep blank.
      widthInPixels - Width in pixels
      返回:
      Returns the index of this text component (to be used with getTextFromEntry, etc.)

    • addTextArea

      public int addTextArea​(java.lang.String defaultText, double widthInPixels, double heightInPixels)
      Adds a multi-line, word-wrapping-capable, auto-scrolling text area. (See also addTextField) Access its contents using getTextFromEntry method. Modify its contents using setTextInEntry method.
      参数:
      defaultText - Default text. Give an emptry String to keep blank.
      widthInPixels - Width in pixels
      heightInPixels - Height in pixels
      返回:
      Returns the index of this text component (to be used with getTextFromEntry, etc.)

    • setTextInFieldEntry

      public void setTextInFieldEntry​(int textFieldIndex, java.lang.String text)

    • getTextFromFieldEntry

      public java.lang.String getTextFromFieldEntry​(int textFieldIndex)

    • setTextInAreaEntry

      public void setTextInAreaEntry​(int textFieldIndex, java.lang.String text)
      Modify the text entered in a text field or a text area. Programmer must keep track of number of text areas currently visible. Indices reset to zero upon calls to the clear() method.
      参数:
      textFieldIndex - Index number of text field/area currently showing.
      text - Text to be added

    • getTextFromAreaEntry

      public java.lang.String getTextFromAreaEntry​(int textFieldIndex)
      Access the text entered in a text field or a text area. Programmer must keep track of number of text areas currently visible. Indices reset to zero upon calls to the clear() method.
      参数:
      textFieldIndex - Index number of text field/area currently showing.
      返回:
      The text that is currently in the specified text element.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the ZTerm like clearing a terminal. To close with GTerm window, use the close method.

    • setFontName

      public void setFontName​(java.lang.String fontName)
      Change the font name used for text that will be added next. Does not change fonts of previously added text.
      参数:
      fontName - A String describing a logical Font. Default is Font.MONOSPACED. See API for more https://openjfx.io/javadoc/15/javafx.graphics/javafx/scene/text/Font.html

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor​(javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor)
      Change the background colour of the window. Default is Color.BLACK.
      参数:
      backgroundColor - For available colours, refer to https://openjfx.io/javadoc/15/javafx.graphics/javafx/scene/paint/Color.html

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor​(double r, double g, double b, double o)
      Change the RGBO background colour of the window. Default is 0,0,0,0.
      参数:
      r - An double between 0-255 indicating the red value
      g - An double between 0-255 indicating the green value
      b - An double between 0-255 indicating the blue value
      o - An double between 0-255 indicating the openness value

    • setFontColor

      public void setFontColor​(javafx.scene.paint.Color fontColor)
      Change the font colour used for text that will be added next. Does not change colours of previously added text.
      参数:
      fontColor - For available colours, refer to https://openjfx.io/javadoc/15/javafx.graphics/javafx/scene/paint/Color.html

    • setFontColor

      public void setFontColor​(double r, double g, double b, double o)
      Change the font colour used for text that will be added next. Does not change colours of previously added text.
      参数:
      r - An double between 0-255 indicating the red value
      g - An double between 0-255 indicating the green value
      b - An double between 0-255 indicating the blue value
      o - An double between 0-255 indicating the openness value

    • print

      public void print​(java.lang.String message)
      Similar to System.out.print. Text is added at current X,Y coordinates. Also see setXY method.
      参数:
      message - String message to display.

    • println

      public void println​(java.lang.String message)
      Similar to System.out.println. Text is added at current X,Y coordinates then cursor moves to "next line". Also see setXY method.
      参数:
      message - String message to display.

    • setXY

      public void setXY​(int x, int y)
      Allows the change of placement within the window. Can be used with print, println, addImageIcon, etc. methods.
      参数:
      x - An int x value within the window
      y - An int y value within the window

    • showMessageDialog

      public void showMessageDialog​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      Shows the supplied message to the user using an information message dialog box.
      参数:
      title - The title String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.
      message - The message String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.

    • showErrorDialog

      public void showErrorDialog​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows the supplied message to the user using an error message dialog box.
      参数:
      message - The message String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.

    • showWarningDialog

      public void showWarningDialog​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows the supplied message to the user using a warning message dialog box.
      参数:
      message - The message String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.

    • showConfirmInformationDialog

      public boolean showConfirmInformationDialog​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows the confirm message to the user using a confirm message dialog box.
      参数:
      message - The message String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.
      返回:
      Boolean value true or false.

    • getInputString

      public java.lang.String getInputString​(java.lang.String message)
      Allows the user to enter a String. Shows an input dialog box with the message String supplied as a prompt.
      参数:
      message - - The message String. If you want to display multiple variables, you will need to concatenate first.
      返回:
      Returns a String. If you need an int or double use Integer.parseInt or Double.parseDouble to convert the returned String.

    • getFilePath

      public java.lang.String getFilePath()
      Displays a file open dialog.
      返回:
      Returns a String of the absolute path of the chosen file.

    • setFilePath

      public java.lang.String setFilePath()
      Displays a file save dialog.
      返回:
      Returns a String of the absolute path of the chosen/entered file.

    • addImageIcon

      public void addImageIcon​(java.lang.String imageFilename)
      Adds an image at current x,y coordinates. Supports GIF, JPEG and PNG. Can be used with getFilePath method as gt.addImageIcon(gt.getFilePath()) Also see setXY method.
      参数:
      imageFilename - Path to a image file.

    • getMouseX

      public double getMouseX()
